title: Professional development and knowledge management strategies for underperforming school improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of educational administration and school operations
context.additional_context: Learning school improvement strategies through smartphone-based microlearning in limited technological environments

learning_goals: Explain at least three systems for knowledge creation, management, and transfer to improve schools.
Design inter-school collaboration strategies through common theory development and tool utilization.
Present at least two strategies to strengthen school leadership capabilities in accountability-driven environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
